short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rediscover Wikipedia in audio. This extension allows you to browse and listen to short podcasts from any Wikipedia article.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wikéo transforms your Wikipedia experience by bringing articles to life through short-form podcasts. Perfect for anyone who loves to learn but doesn't always have the time to read, this extension allows you to listen to Wikipedia articles while on the go or multitasking.

If simply prefer audio content or just want to multitask, Wikéo delivers bite-sized podcasts for every Wikipedia article, narrated by a variety of podcast hosts and formats. The best part? It’s designed for fans of podcasts, audiobooks, and anyone with a thirst for knowledge.

With Wikéo, you can discover new topics, explore the depths of Wikipedia’s vast library, and satisfy your curiosity without sitting down to read. If you’re someone who enjoys learning stuff you should know, Wikéo is for you!

Listening sets you free—no more being tied to your screen. Unlock a world of information by listening to Wikipedia, and make the most of every moment!
